name: RivetzRegistrar

attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership
ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: ERC20

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@title Rivetz SPID Registration Contract
 * @dev This is a Registrar-like contract
attributes.name: RivetzRegistrar

attributes.documentation:
Register a new SPID
Sending address is initial registrant and administrator
attributes.name: register

attributes.documentation: Register a new SPID, sender must be Rivetz
attributes.name: rivetzRegister

attributes.documentation: Create a new SP entry for further modification
attributes.name: newEntry

attributes.documentation: Change registrant, must be existing registrant or Rivetz
attributes.name: setRegistrant

attributes.documentation: Change admin, must be existing registrant or Rivetz
attributes.name: setAdmin

attributes.documentation: Change pubKey, must be existing registrant or Rivetz
attributes.name: setPubKey

attributes.documentation: Change info hash, must be admin, registrant or Rivetz
attributes.name: setInfo

attributes.documentation: Mark as approved, must be done by Rivetz
attributes.name: setValid

attributes.documentation: Renew subscription -- can be done by anyone that pays
attributes.name: renew

attributes.documentation: Set subscription end date -- can only be done by Rivetz
attributes.name: setExpiration

attributes.documentation: Permanently deactivate SPID, must be registrant -- expires subscription, invalidates
attributes.name: release

attributes.documentation: Disable SPID, zeroes out everything -- must be Rivetz
attributes.name: rivetzRelease

attributes.documentation: Set new registration and annual fees -- must be Rivetz
attributes.name: setFees

attributes.documentation: RvT is upgradeable, make sure we can update Registrar to use upgraded RvT
attributes.name: setToken

attributes.documentation: Change payment address -- must be Rivetz
attributes.name: setPaymentAddress

attributes.documentation:
Permission check - admin or greater
SP Registrant or Admin can't proceed if subscription expired
attributes.name: requireAdminOrGreater

attributes.documentation:
Permission check - registrant or greater
SP Registrant or Admin can't proceed if subscription expired
attributes.name: requireRegistrantOrGreater

attributes.documentation: Get annual fee in RvT
attributes.name: getAnnualFee
feeToSeconds
